import{range,zip}from"lodash";export function callEach(){for(var _len=arguments.length,fns=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){fns[_key]=arguments[_key];}return arg=>{fns.forEach(fn=>fn(arg));};}/**
 * Yields each item of `iterable`, collecting the results given by the caller
 * into an array, and returns the array of results.
 */export function*collect(iterable){const results=[];for(const item of iterable){results.push(yield item);}return results;}export function withIndices(items){return zip(items,range(items.length));}
